鎩.definition: (old) spear; lance; (literary) to cripple; to harm; to injure

鎩羽.definition: (literary) (lit.) to cripple the wings of a bird; (literary) (fig.) depressed; despondent; defeated

鎩羽而歸.definition: (idiom) to return in low spirits following a defeat or failure to achieve one's ambitions
